Uses of Package
org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies

  • Packages that use org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies 
    Package Description
    org.sbrubbles.conditio
    Holds an implementation of a simple condition system.
    org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies
    Defines ways to handle certain cases (e.g. no handlers for a condition) in a signal invocation.
  • Classes in org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies used by org.sbrubbles.conditio 
    Class and Description
    Policies
    A set of policies for a specific signal invocation.
  • Classes in org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies used by org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies 
    Class and Description
    HandlerNotFoundPolicy
    What to do if no handler is found for a given signalling.
    ReturnTypePolicy
    The type a signal invocation expects to return.
